title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler in Photon
description: When using Photon, there is an issue where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
OB: When using Photon, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor does not bring up the expected popup menu.
EB: When using Photon, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor should bring up a popup menu with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
To reproduce this issue in Photon: 
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
Expected behavior: A popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
